CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper October 19, 1946, pg. 21, reads: "Thrill-Packed Drama - The 'Curtaineers,' interracial dramatic group of Irene Kaufmann Settlement are shown rehearsing a coup of the most exciting scenes in 'Gas Light,' which will open next Tuesday night in Theresa L. Kaufmann Auditorium. At the left are Althea Washington and David Filner, who have both had considerable theatre experience; and right, William Jenkins and Ruth Schwartz. Directing the production is Simon Gerson, who promises Pittsburghers a group of top-notch performances this season. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Actors from Curtaineers drama group David Filner and Althea Washington, in production of "Gas Light" on set with striped wallpaper, tall clock, and bookcase in Theresa L. Kaufmann Auditorium
